bibl.title: P. Amst. I 24: A Romanus Melodus Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Amst. I, 24 recto contains portions of stanzas 6 and 8 of Hymn 11 of Romanus Melodus [Hymn 11 Grosdidier = 2 M.-T. = 42 Krumbacher]; the little that survives on the other side does not match with any text ascribed to Romanus. Unknown provenance, VI/VII century. Transcription, reconstruction and notes.
BRUNNER Theodore F., P. Amst. I 24: A Romanus Melodus Papyrus.
